mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST(title, content, userId, createDate) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, #{userId}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT ID, TITLE, CONTENT, USERID, CREATEDATE FROM POST ORDER BY ID DESC
SELECT P.ID, P.TITLE, P.CONTENT, U.USERNAME FROM POST P INNER JOIN USER U ON P.USERID = U.ID WHERE P.ID = #{ID}
